translation.en: on the first democratic constitution.
That's Tamir Mafraad, Aladeen's trusted advisor,
translation.fr: Voici Tamir Mafraad, le conseiller d'Aladeen.

translation.en: sharing a lighthearted moment with Chinese businessman, Xiang Lao.
translation.fr: Il plaisante avec l'homme d'affaires chinois, Xiang Lao.

translation.en: Any thoughts on what they might be saying, Mike?
I thought I made out the words Harvey Keitel.
translation.fr: Il serait question de Harvey Keitel.

translation.en: Don't know what that meant.
Maybe they shared a hot dog together, I'm thinking?
translation.fr: Ils ont peut-être mangé un hot-dog.

translation.en: That would make sense. He's wiping the mustard off his face and chest.
translation.fr: Effectivement. Il retire de la moutarde de son visage et de sa veste.

translation.en: Excuse me!
You have to let me in. You don't understand.
He's trying to stop the signing!
Tamir is now speaking.
Today,
we begin a new era.
Wadiya will be open to the world.
translation.fr: La Wadiya va s'ouvrir au monde.

translation.en: Open to the future.
And open for business.
The document is ready to be signed, Supreme Leader.
translation.fr: Le document attend votre signature, Guide suprême.

translation.en: What are you doing? This man is an imposter!
No! This traitor tried to kill me and had my beard removed!
translation.fr: Ce traître a tenté de me tuer et m'a fait couper la barbe !

translation.en: - Look! - Oh!
Arrest the viper Tamir!
And now in another
amazing turn of events, Tamir Mafraad is being taken away.
This constitution
is nothing but a license for oil companies
and foreign interests to destroy my beloved Wadiya!
translation.fr: et intérêts étrangers à ruiner ma bien-aimée Wadiya !

translation.en: Wadiya will remain a dictatorship!
Oh, be quiet.
Why are you guys so anti dictators?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce que vous avez contre les dictateurs ?

translation.en: Imagine if America was a dictatorship.
translation.fr: Imaginez que l'Amérique soit une dictature.

translation.en: You could let 1% of the people have all the nation's wealth.
translation.fr: Vous pourriez laisser 1 % de la population avoir toutes les richesses.

translation.en: You could help your rich friends
translation.fr: Vous pourriez aider vos riches amis

translation.en: get richer by cutting their taxes
and bailing them out when they gamble and lose.
translation.fr: et en les renflouant s'ils misent sur un mauvais cheval.

translation.en: You could ignore the needs of the poor for health care and education.
translation.fr: Vous pourriez refuser aux pauvres les soins et l'éducation.

translation.en: Your media would appear free
but would secretly be controlled by one person and his family.
translation.fr: mais une seule personne et sa famille les contrôleraient.

translation.en: You could wiretap phones, you could torture foreign prisoners.
translation.fr: Vous pourriez mettre sur écoute. Torturer les prisonniers étrangers.

translation.en: You could have rigged elections.
You could lie about why you go to war.
You could fill your prisons
with one particular racial group and no one would complain!
translation.fr: d'un seul groupe ethnique, et nul ne s'en plaindrait !

translation.en: You could use the media to scare the people
translation.fr: Utiliser les médias pour effrayer le peuple

translation.en: into supporting policies that are against their interests.
translation.fr: et lui faire soutenir des politiques qui lui nuisent.

translation.en: I know this is hard for you Americans to imagine,
translation.fr: Pour vous, Américains, c'est dur à imaginer,

translation.en: but please try.
I will tell you what democracy is!
translation.fr: Je vais vous dire ce que c'est, la démocratie !

translation.en: Democracy is the worst!
Endless talking and listening to every stupid opinion!
translation.fr: Des jours à discuter et à entendre des âneries !

translation.en: And everybody's vote counts,
translation.fr: Et le vote de chacun compte,

translation.en: no matter how crippled or black or female they are.
Democracy...
Democracy
has hairy armpits and could lose five pounds.
translation.fr: a une jungle sous les bras et deux kilos à perdre.

translation.en: Democracy looks like a midget in a chemo wig.
translation.fr: Démocratie a l'air d'un nain sous chimio.

translation.en: Democracy kisses you because she wants to,
translation.fr: Démocratie t'embrasse de son plein gré,

translation.en: not because her father is in the next room chained to a radiator
translation.fr: pas parce que son père est enchaîné au radiateur,

translation.en: with electrodes attached to his nipples.
Democracy is flawed! She is not perfect!
translation.fr: Démocratie a des défauts ! Elle n'est pas parfaite !

translation.en: But democracy,
I love you.
And that is why I call for real democracy!
translation.fr: Voilà pourquoi j'appelle à une vraie démocratie !

translation.en: A real constitution!
And real elections in Wadiya!
Oh, no!
Come on!
Democracy, I will make you one of my wives.
translation.fr: Démocratie, tu seras une de mes femmes.

translation.en: Okay, only wife. We'll vote on it.
translation.fr: Ma seule femme. On va voter.

translation.en: I'll shave my armpits for you.
translation.fr: Je me raserai les aisselles pour toi.

translation.en: Praise be to the Creator!
And please stop using that organic deodorant.
You could gas the Kurds with that stench.
translation.fr: Tu gazerais les Kurdes avec cette puanteur.

translation.en: You died protecting me, Efawadh.
translation.fr: Tu as donné ta vie pour moi, Efawadh.

translation.en: Hello!
You are alive?
Of course! It is my job to be shot in the head.
translation.fr: Bien sûr ! C'est mon rôle, de prendre une balle dans la tête.

translation.en: - Is he okay? - He's fine.
Luckily the bullet hit him in the brain.
translation.fr: Une chance, la balle a touché le cerveau.

translation.en: Oh. So, um,
what now?
I return to Wadiya to participate in fair elections.
translation.fr: Je rentre en Wadiya participer à des élections libres.

translation.en: Let's now look back at the wonderful events of the past year.
translation.fr: Rappel des glorieux événements survenus cette année.

translation.en: After Wadiya's first free elections,
President Prime Minister Admiral General Aladeen
translation.fr: le président Premier ministre amiral général Aladeen

translation.en: won 98.8% of the vote.
But the big story today is the marriage of President Prime Minister
translation.fr: Mais l'événement est le mariage du président Premier ministre

translation.en: Admiral General Aladeen and his new bride, Zoey.
translation.fr: amiral général Aladeen avec sa nouvelle femme, Zoey.

translation.en: I now pronounce you man and wife.
translation.fr: Je vous déclare mari et femme.

translation.en: Are you okay, my love? What did you step on?
translation.fr: Ça va, mon amour ? Sur quoi tu as marché ?

translation.en: Oh, yes! No, no.
It's my people's tradition. We always smash a glass at weddings.
translation.fr: C'est la tradition, chez nous. On casse un verre aux mariages.

translation.en: - I'm Jewish! - What?
Mazel tov!
Are you okay?
That's fine. I don't mind. It's great!
translation.fr: C'est rien. Pas de problème. Super !

translation.en: Come here, my love.
Jachnoon, President Prime Minister Aladeen.
Jachnoon. Nadal. I have to be back at the palace in an hour.
translation.fr: Jachnoun, Nadal. Je dois être au palais dans une heure.

translation.en: Zoey thinks I'm at yoga.
I have great news.
We are just days away from testing the new missiles.
translation.fr: dans quelques jours, on testera les nouveaux missiles.

translation.en: I have re- engineered the oxidizing ducts
and the payload delivery systems.
But you'll be happy to know, the missile is now pointy!
translation.fr: Et vous allez être ravi, le missile est désormais pointu !

translation.en: Who cares if it's pointy?
What?
You do. You care if it's pointy.
Why would I care about such a trivial detail?
Are you serious? Are you serious right now?
translation.fr: Vous êtes sérieux ? Vous êtes sérieux, là ?

translation.en: Of course I'm serious.
That's why you had me executed!
The shape of the missile has nothing to do with the payload delivery.
translation.fr: La forme n'influe pas sur la charge explosive.

translation.en: That's what I said! That's what I said the first time!
translation.fr: C'est moi qui l'ai dit le premier !

translation.en: - No, that's what I said, and you went crazy. - No!
translation.fr: Non, moi. Et tu as crisé. Non !

translation.en: So, we, um, we're opening 300 Women's Centers,
translation.fr: On ouvre 300 Maisons de la Femme.

translation.en: but I'm going to have to take a break for a little bit because
translation.fr: Mais je vais devoir lever le pied parce que...

translation.en: I'm pregnant.
What?
Are you having a boy or an abortion?
translation.fr: Ce sera un garçon ou un avortement ?

translation.en: Hello, gentlemen. How you doin'?
Are you guys friends of the deceased?
translation.fr: Vous êtes des amis du défunt ?

translation.en: Do you want me to say this in front of his widow?
translation.fr: Je le dis devant sa veuve ?

translation.en: I was his lover.
No. That is not true.
I saw him perform with the Globetrotters.
translation.fr: Je l'ai vu jouer avec les Globetrotters.

translation.en: I thought he was outstanding. I befriended him.
No, it's a different person.
His message of don't worry and being happy
was so powerful.
translation.fr: c'est puissant. Ça, c'est Bobby McFerrin. Je vous l'ai dit.

translation.en: No, this is Bobby McFerrin. I told you this outside.
translation.fr: Ça, c'est Bobby McFerrin. Je vous l'ai dit.

translation.en: Whatever the scandal you went through,
you're still the best golfer in the world.
translation.fr: tu restes le meilleur golfeur du monde.

translation.en: Let's go.
Okay. Let's rehearse this. Role play, role play.
So, Secretary General, your soldiers will weep...
I am so sorry!
Listen, it was not my fault.
I mean, somebody had set the safety catch
translation.fr: Quelqu'un a mis le cran de sûreté

translation.en: to Aladeen instead of Aladeen.
translation.fr: sur Aladeen au lieu de Aladeen.

translation.en: Look, I mean, this whole gun...
Mmm- mmm! That's some good head!
That is called payback and it feels so good!
translation.fr: C'est ma vengeance et c'est bon !

translation.en: How did it feel for you? How did it feel for you?
translation.fr: Ça t'a plu ? Ça t'a plu ?

translation.en: I prefer it with goats.
Where is the Supreme Leader?
No, no.
Now that is called payback!
- - Oh, great!
Don't touch it. Don't touch it.
You don't have to touch it.
Sorry. I was...
Just give us... We don't...
Just give me a couple of millimeters to myself.
translation.fr: Reste à quelques millimètres de moi.
